newsitem.title: ESTONIA: TALLINN PORT PASSENGERS UP IN JULY.
newsitem.headline: TALLINN PORT PASSENGERS UP IN JULY.

text.p: The number of passengers handled by the Port of Tallinn during July was over 601,500 setting a new record, Tallinn Port said on Monday.
It said in a statement that compared to July last year, the number of passengers handled increased by 37 percent.
Since visa-free travel with Finland and Sweden was introduced in May, the number of passengers increased by 23 percent in May and 32 percent in June over the previous year.
The total number of passengers handled by the port for the year to July was 2.73 million, an increase of eight percent compared to the same period in 1996.
